Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM Informix
AUTHOR: Oracle
Description : - Reverse Knowledge Module - Reverse engineer data structure information (such as tables, columns, indexes, and constraints) from a Informix database.
Restrictions: - The mask of tables to reverse must not be empty, and at least contain the '%' character.
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(con.constrname) KEY_NAME, trim(col.colname) COL_NAME, col.colno POS from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab, informix.syscolumns col, informix.sysconstraints con where idx.tabid =tab.tabid and idx.idxtype in ('U') and con.constrtype = 'P' and tab.tabid = con.tabid and idx.idxname= con.idxname and col.tabid=idx.tabid and (col.colno=idx.part1 or col.colno=idx.part2 or col.colno=idx.part3 or col.colno=idx.part4 or col.colno=idx.part5 or col.colno=idx.part6 or col.colno=idx.part7 or col.colno=idx.part8 ) and con.owner = tab.owner and idx.owner = tab.owner and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(con.constrname) KEY_NAME, case when con.constrtype = 'U' then 'AK' when con.constrtype = 'N' then 'I' when con.constrtype = 'T' then 'I' else 'I' end CONS_TYPE from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.sysconstraints con, informix.systables tab where idx.idxtype like '%' and con.constrtype != 'P' and con.constrtype != 'C' and con.constrtype != 'R' and tab.tabid = con.tabid and idx.idxname= con.idxname and idx.tabid = tab.tabid and con.owner = tab.owner and idx.owner = tab.owner and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(con.constrname) KEY_NAME, trim(col.colname) COL_NAME, col.colno POS from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab, informix.syscolumns col, informix.sysconstraints con where idx.tabid = tab.tabid and idx.idxtype like '%' and con.constrtype != 'P' and tab.tabid = con.tabid and idx.idxname= con.idxname and col.tabid=idx.tabid and (col.colno=idx.part1 or col.colno=idx.part2 or col.colno=idx.part3 or col.colno=idx.part4 or col.colno=idx.part5 or col.colno=idx.part6 or col.colno=idx.part7 or col.colno=idx.part8 ) and con.owner = tab.owner and idx.owner = tab.owner and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN ( MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE, DEL_RULE, UPD_RULE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :KEY_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'D', '', :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', '1', 'N', 'R' )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(con.constrname) KEY_NAME, tab_pk.tabname PK_TABLE_NAME from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab, informix.systables tab_pk, informix.sysconstraints con, informix.SYSREFERENCES ref where idx.idxtype like '%' and con.constrtype = 'R' and tab.tabid = con.tabid and idx.idxname= con.idxname and ref.constrid = con.constrid and ref.ptabid = tab_pk.tabid and idx.tabid = tab.tabid and con.owner = tab.owner and idx.owner = tab.owner and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL (
MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :KEY_NAME, :FK_COL, :TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(con.constrname) KEY_NAME, trim(col.colname) FK_COL, tab_pk.tabname PK_TABLE_NAME, trim(col_pk.colname) PK_COL, col.colno POS from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab, informix.systables tab_pk, informix.sysconstraints con, informix.SYSREFERENCES ref, informix.syscolumns col, informix.sysconstraints con_pk, informix.sysindexes idx_pk, informix.syscolumns col_pk
where idx.idxtype like '%' and con.constrtype = 'R' and tab.tabid = con.tabid and idx.idxname= con.idxname and ref.constrid = con.constrid and ref.ptabid = tab_pk.tabid and idx.tabid = tab.tabid and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
and ref.primary = con_pk.constrid and idx_pk.idxname= con_pk.idxname
and col.tabid=idx.tabid and col_pk.tabid=idx_pk.tabid and ( col.colno=idx.part1 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part1 or col.colno=idx.part2 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part2 or col.colno=idx.part3 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part3 or col.colno=idx.part4 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part4 or col.colno=idx.part5 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part5 or col.colno=idx.part6 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part6 or col.colno=idx.part7 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part7 or col.colno=idx.part8 and col_pk.colno=idx_pk.part8
)
and con.owner = tab.owner and idx.owner = tab.owner and con_pk.owner = tab.owner and idx_pk.owner = tab.owner

select trim(tab.tabname) CK_TABLE_NAME, trim(con.constrname) CK_NAME, trim(chk.checktext) CK_COND from informix.systables tab, informix.sysconstraints con, informix.SYSCHECKS chk where con.constrtype = 'C' and tab.tabid = con.tabid and chk.constrid = con.constrid and chk.type = 'T' and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and con.owner = tab.owner

insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(idx.idxname) KEY_NAME, case when idx.idxtype = 'U' then 'AK' when idx.idxtype = 'D' then 'I' else 'I' end CONS_TYPE
from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab
where idx.tabid = tab.tabid and idx.owner = tab.owner and idx.tabid = tab.tabid
and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
and idx.idxname not in ( select con2.idxname from informix.sysconstraints con2, informix.systables tab2 where tab2.tabid = con2.tabid and con2.owner = tab2.owner and con2.idxname is not null and tab2.owner = tab.owner and tab2.tabname = tab.tabname )
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(idx.idxname) KEY_NAME, trim(col.colname) COL_NAME, col.colno POS
from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.syscolumns col, informix.systables tab
where idx.tabid = tab.tabid and idx.owner = tab.owner and idx.tabid = tab.tabid
and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
and idx.idxname not in ( select con2.idxname from informix.sysconstraints con2, informix.systables tab2 where tab2.tabid = con2.tabid and con2.owner = tab2.owner and con2.idxname is not null and tab2.owner = tab.owner and tab2.tabname = tab.tabname )
and col.tabid=idx.tabid and (col.colno=idx.part1 or col.colno=idx.part2 or col.colno=idx.part3 or col.colno=idx.part4 or col.colno=idx.part5 or col.colno=idx.part6 or col.colno=idx.part7 or col.colno=idx.part8 )

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, 'T', '1', :R_COUNT )

select trim(t.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(t.tabname) RES_NAME, t.tabname[1,3] TABLE_ALIAS, t.nrows R_COUNT from informix.systables t where t.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and t.tabtype in ( 'T','V','E')

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, COL_HEADING, DT_DRIVER, POS, LONGC, BYTES, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, col_desc, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :POS, :LONGC, :BYTES, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', :COL_DESC, '1' )

select trim(t.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(c.colname) COL_NAME, '' COL_DESC, trim(case when coltype >= 256 then case when coltype - 256=0 then 'CHAR' when coltype - 256=1 then 'SMALLINT' when coltype - 256=2 then 'INTEGER' when coltype - 256=3 then 'FLOAT' when coltype - 256=4 then 'SMALLFLOAT' when coltype - 256=5 then 'DECIMAL' when coltype - 256=6 then 'SERIAL' when coltype - 256=7 then 'DATE' when coltype - 256=8 then 'MONEY' when coltype - 256=10 then 'DATETIME YEAR TO FRACTION(5)' when coltype - 256=11 then 'BYTE' when coltype - 256=12 then 'TEXT' when coltype - 256=13 then 'VARCHAR' when coltype - 256=14 then 'INTERVAL' when coltype - 256=15 then 'NCHAR' when coltype - 256=16 then 'NVARCHAR' when coltype - 256=17 then 'INT8' when coltype - 256=18 then 'SERIAL8' when coltype - 256=40 then 'LVARCHAR' when coltype - 256=52 then 'BIGINT' when coltype - 256=53 then 'BIGSERIAL' when coltype - 256=2061 then 'IDSSECURITYLABEL' when (coltype - 256=41 and extended_id = 5) then 'BOOLEAN' when (coltype - 256=41 and extended_id = 10) then 'BLOB' when (coltype - 256=41 and extended_id = 11) then 'CLOB' else 'VARCHAR' end when coltype < 256 then case when coltype =0 then 'CHAR' when coltype =1 then 'SMALLINT' when coltype =2 then 'INTEGER' when coltype =3 then 'FLOAT' when coltype =4 then 'SMALLFLOAT' when coltype =5 then 'DECIMAL' when coltype =6 then 'SERIAL' when coltype =7 then 'DATE' when coltype =8 then 'MONEY' when coltype =10 then 'DATETIME YEAR TO FRACTION(5)' when coltype =11 then 'BYTE' when coltype =12 then 'TEXT' when coltype =13 then 'VARCHAR' when coltype =14 then 'INTERVAL' when coltype =15 then 'NCHAR' when coltype =16 then 'NVARCHAR' when coltype =17 then 'INT8' when coltype =18 then 'SERIAL8' when coltype =40 then 'LVARCHAR' when coltype =52 then 'BIGINT' when coltype =53 then 'BIGSERIAL' when coltype =2061 then 'IDSSECURITYLABEL' when (coltype =41 and extended_id = 5) then 'BOOLEAN' when (coltype =41 and extended_id = 10) then 'BLOB' when (coltype =41 and extended_id = 11) then 'CLOB' else 'VARCHAR' end end) DT_DRIVER, c.colno POS, case when coltype >=256 then case when coltype-256 = 0 then c.collength when coltype-256 = 1 then 5 when (coltype-256 = 2 or coltype-256 = 6) then 10 when coltype-256 = 3 then 64 when coltype-256 = 4 then 32 when (coltype-256 = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when (coltype-256 = 15) then c.collength when (coltype-256 = 13 or coltype-256 = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end when coltype <256 then case when coltype = 0 then c.collength when coltype = 1 then 5 when (coltype = 2 or coltype = 6) then 10 when coltype = 3 then 64 when coltype = 4 then 32 when (coltype = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when (coltype = 15) then c.collength when (coltype = 13 or coltype = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end end LONGC, case when coltype >=256 then case when coltype-256 = 0 then c.collength when coltype-256 = 1 then 5 when (coltype-256 = 2 or coltype-256 = 6) then 10 when coltype-256 = 3 then 64 when coltype-256 = 4 then 32 when (coltype-256 = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when coltype-256 = 15 then c.collength when (coltype-256 = 13 or coltype-256 = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end when coltype <256 then case when coltype = 0 then c.collength when coltype = 1 then 5 when (coltype = 2 or coltype = 6) then 10 when coltype = 3 then 64 when coltype = 4 then 32 when (coltype = 5 or coltype = 8) then (trunc(c.collength / 256)) when coltype-256 = 15 then c.collength when (coltype = 13 or coltype = 16) then (c.collength - (trunc(c.collength / 256))*256) end end BYTES, case when coltype >=256 then case when (coltype-256 = 1 or coltype-256 = 2 or coltype-256 = 6) then 0 when (coltype-256 = 5 or coltype-256 = 8) then (c.collength - ((trunc(c.collength / 256))*256)) end when coltype <256 then case when (coltype = 1 or coltype = 2 or coltype = 6) then 0 when (coltype = 5 or coltype = 8) then (c.collength - ((trunc(c.collength / 256))*256)) end end SCALEC, case when coltype >= 256 then '1' ELSE '0' end COL_MANDATORY from informix.syscolumns c,informix.systables t Where t.owner like '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and t.tabid=c.tabid
insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, 'PK', '1', '1', '1' )

select trim(tab.tabname) TABLE_NAME, trim(con.constrname) KEY_NAME from informix.sysindexes idx, informix.systables tab, informix.sysconstraints con where idx.idxtype = 'U' and con.constrtype = 'P' and con.owner = tab.owner and tab.tabid = con.tabid and idx.idxname= con.idxname and idx.tabid = tab.tabid and idx.owner = tab.owner and tab.owner = '<%=snpRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and tab.tabname like '<%=snpRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'
